play.cache

类 MemcachedImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.cache.MemcachedImpl
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    CacheImpl

    public class MemcachedImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements CacheImpl
    Memcached implementation (using http://code.google.com/p/spymemcached/) expiration is specified in seconds
